title: Hextech - unlocked dark star thresh.. not added to my skins
body:
Hi Riot

I just used a gem stone to get a case and key, probably not the best idea, however I got dark star thresh which I was super happy about!

I then proceeded to disenchant my existing hextech loot to upgrade it to permanant, great. unlocked it, got the message that it was added to my inventory...

Alas no skin... I'm confused would it be possible to take a look at my account please??


Thanks

Swisskid, EUWest

replies.body: Sooooo I was able to figure out what happened, but it might not be the answer you were hoping for. The skin shard you got and redeemed wasn't actually Dark Star Thresh, it was Dark Star Kha'Zix. The skin was redeemed and added to your account, and it looks like you were able to use him already.
